author: Freya McClements
title: Coronavirus outbreaks identified in 53 care homes in Northern Ireland
description: SDLP leader and trade union call for all-island efforts in the fight against Covid-19
content:
Outbreaks of coronavirus have been identified in 53 care homes in Northern Ireland, according to figures published on Sunday by the Norths Department of Health. 
The figure comes as trade union Unison called for an immediate programme of testing for all care… [+3555 chars]
